Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 21 Ajjhattattika » 21.1 Paṭiccavāra » 21.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 21.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Napacchājātādi
Ajjhattattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Napacchājātādi
11.
2777Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā, naāsevanapaccayā, nakammapaccayā—  ajjhatte khandhe paṭicca ajjhattā cetanā. Āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…pe… . (1)
2778Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—  bahiddhā khandhe paṭicca bahiddhā cetanā. Bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ… . (1)
